allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add interactive live demos for BIMO, Pick Habju, and TwoPlus projects

- Create reusable BrowserFrame component \(macOS-style browser chrome\)
- Add BIMO demo: step wizard simulating boarding pass scan → AI analysis → flight card → personalized guide
- Add Pick Habju demo: music room search/filter/booking simulator with mock data
- Add TwoPlus demo: static HTML recreation of company landing page via iframe
- Refactor timetable page to use BrowserFrame component
- Add "TRY LIVE DEMO" buttons to BIMO, Pick Habju, and TwoPlus project pages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
